div.p: Legacy Studios have ceased operations until schools return to normal activities. Their production department is processing the orders and they will be shipped directly to the school once they are printed. Unfortunately, the labs are closed due to the stay at home orders in the states where they are located. Once they re-open, the packages will be printed and shipped.
It is time to enroll for next year!!!

div.class: custom_79535 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated zoomIn

p.span: We are taking pre orders for the 2020 yearbooks for $35
You can also order online at jostensyearbooks.com

div.p: 1st Grade, 2nd Grade, 3rd Grade, 4th Grade, 5th Grade, 6th Grade

strong.style: text-align: center; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 20.79px; font-family: tahoma, geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 36px;

span.strong: Cheer, Cheer for ole Coalgate High
Wake up the echoes cheering her name
Raise a volley cheer on high
And shake down the thunder from the sky
What though the odds be great or small
Ole Coalgate High will win over all
While her loyal sons are marching

strong.style: text-align: center; font-family: tahoma, geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 48px;

p.span: It is the policy of Coalgate Independence School District not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, sex, national origin, religion, disability, veteran starus, sexual orientation, age or genetic information in its vocational and educational programs, services, activities, or employment as required by Title VI of the Civil Right Act of 196, as amended, Title IX of the Education Amendments of Employment Act of 1975, and the Americans with Disabilites Act of 1990. The district also provides equal access to the Boy Scouts of America and other designated youth groups. The district has designated the following individuals to receive discrimination complaints:
Amy Mauk..............................race, color, national origin, age 580-927-2351 EXT 107
Amy Mauk..............................sex and all other complaints 580-927-2351 EXT 146
